desc.en: The light rail system is the first rail transit project in Macau. It is divided into the Taipa Line, the extension of the Taipa Line to the Macau Magong Station, the Seac Pai Van Line, the East Line, and the extension of the Macau Light Rail to Hengqin Line.
desc.zh-Hant: 輕軌系統為本澳首個軌道交通項目，分為氹仔線、氹仔延伸澳門媽閣站、石排灣線、東線以及澳門輕軌延伸橫琴線。
